DOC.detailed_description: This Stage I pilot study employ randomize , control , group design 70 opiate dependent patient seek methadone detoxification randomize one two treatment condition : ACT opiate detoxification therapy Drug Counseling . Both therapy deliver context 5-month methadone dose reduction base linear dose strategy . Efficacy variable include : ( 1 ) abstinence rate 1-month detoxification assess regular urine screen ; ( 2 ) retention patient treatment ; ( 3 ) patient satisfaction treatment acceptability . Reduction HIV/Hepatitis C risk behavior change psychosocial functioning ( e.g. , employment , family , legal ) also explore , along mediators/moderators therapy ( i.e. , experiential avoidance ) . Subjects recruit Houston area methadone clinic general community via advertising receive methadone part protocol . A 2-4 week stabilization period precede 5-month methadone dose reduction . During dose reduction , participant attend clinic twice week receive weekly therapy . Participants contact follow assessment one month post treatment .
